author.name: Customer | Fresh ideas by you - navibear

description: This honey chicken recipe is one of Navi's from NSW favourite fuss-free dinners. Served with a crunchy kaleslaw, this tasty recipe is ready in 25 minutes.
name: Honey Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 750g chicken breast fillets, cut into strips
1L vegetable oil (to deep-fry, save 2 tsp for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Place flours, baking powder, soda water and salt in a large bowl. Stir until well combined.
Add chicken to flour mixture and toss to coat.

Add enough oil to a large saucepan to come 4cm up side of pan. Heat oil over medium-high heat (to test when oil is ready, a cube of bread will turn golden in 15 seconds). Cook chicken, in batches, for 3 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.
Meanwhile, make kaleslaw kit according to packet instructions.
Heat extra oil and honey in a large frying pan over medium heat until bubbling. Add chicken and toss to coat.
Divide kaleslaw and chicken among bowls. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and spring onion, and serve with lime wedges.
